title: I Don't Need an Update
itunes:title: I Don't Need an Update
description:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners prefer a basic phone to just be able to contact people or they need that and more apps on their phone, after Iphone made an announcement about their new iphone 12 coming out. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a white man dresses up in blackface to kill his baby mom and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
